scripts.start:dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev"  "cd frontend && npm run dev" "node proxyserver.js"
scripts.fdev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev"  "cd frontend && npm run dev" "node proxyserver.js"
scripts.startb: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:prod" "cd frontend && npm run build && npm run start" "node proxyserver.js"
